overview: He’s Holland’s very own mega-slut – the blond bombshell from The Hague, who quite literally lives for cock on a permanent 24/7 basis! But whilst he may hail from the land of tulips and windmills, his real spiritual home is Czechia – more precisely, among the bevy of handsome twinks of Prague, who are only too willing to make the very most of his quite insatiable arse! Guys like Jaro Stone, Yuri Adamov and Pyotr Tomek, who can’t wait to give this mindless slut exactly what he wants. Namely hard, uncut cock – time after time after time!
title: Let's Play with Kris Blent
